edu.ucla.sspace.hal
Interface WeightingFunction

All Known Implementing Classes:
EvenWeighting, GeometricWeighting, LinearWeighting
public interface WeightingFunction

A function interface for specifying how a HyperspaceAnalogueToLanguage instance should weigh co-occurrences based on the word distance.

Method Summary
 double weight(int positionOffset, int windowSize)
          Returns the weighed value for a word at the specified offset.
 

Method Detail

weight

double weight(int positionOffset,
              int windowSize)
Returns the weighed value for a word at the specified offset. Negative offsets indicate the the word appears before; positive offsets indicate that the word appears after

Parameters:
positionOffset - the location of the word relative to the current position
windowSize - the maximum nubmer of words on one side that will be considered for weighting
Returns:
the weight to apply
